vanessa auraphin

  • about twitter

interested in software studies, philosophy of information, complex socio-technical systems, human-machine ecologies.

this blog makes up a palette of looseleaf writing snippets - little blocks of writings on topics i find illumining. sometimes ordered, mostly not. weaving together convergences across humanities, critical theory and computer science.

  • 2020 May 10 Cosmologies, Part I (Ongoing)
  • 2020 May 07 A Study on Flow in The Time of Covid-19
  • 2020 Mar 16 I as Alien Intelligence
  • 2020 Feb 26 Ecological Anthropology & Cybernetics with Gregory Bateson
  • 2020 Feb 13 Terraformation, Emergence and Human Agency (edited)
  • 2020 Feb 05 Notes on Information theory - Your brain on psychedelics to life in the universe
  • 2020 Jan 12 Rethinking the liquid natures of the human and machine ecology (draft)
